Music

I write songs under my own name, and sometimes under the name The Other White Noise.

Forever Alone

A weird song about being sad, alone, and pathetic. It's also humorous for some reason.

You can buy this track on Bandcamp.

Fear of Water

My favorite track of all time. I felt clever as hell when I wrote it and I think you'll like this cute Ekulele song.

You can buy this track on Bandcamp.
